content.text:
# 2017 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's singles__disambig_1

Egor Gerasimov
| runner   =  Mikhail Kukushkin
| score    = 7–6(11–9), 4–6, 6–4
| edition  =
}}
Evgeny Donskoy was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals to Egor Gerasimov.
Gerasimov won the title after defeating Mikhail Kukushkin 7–6(11–9), 4–6, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Evgeny Donskoy (quarterfinals)
#  Mikhail Kukushkin (final)
#  Alexander Bublik (semifinals)
#  Lee Duck-hee (quarterfinals)
#  Egor Gerasimov (champion)
#  Nikola Milojević (second round)
#  Kwon Soon-woo (quarterfinals)
#  Aldin Šetkić (semifinals)
}}
